title: Roast turkey salad with cranberry dressing
ingredients: ['4 lean smoked back bacon rashers', "125g mixed salad leaves (such as radicchio, red chard and lamb's lettuce)", '400g can borlotti or cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '150g button mushrooms, sliced', '1 mango, peeled, stoned and diced', '200g sliced cooked turkey breast, cut into strips', 'CRANBERRY DRESSING', '2 tbsp cranberry sauce', '1 tbsp balsamic vinegar', '4 tbsp olive oil']
